Name: Extending J-51 benefits to owners of multiple dwellings for green roofs.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to extending J-51 benefits to owners of multiple dwellings for green roofs.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Housing and Buildings
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows: 
	
Section 1. Subdivision a of section 11-243 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding new paragraphs 9, 10 and 11  to read as follows:
9. “Green roof” shall mean a roofing system covered with vegetation and soil, or a growing medium, planted over a waterproofing membrane.  
10. “Solar panel roof” shall mean a roofing system that utilizes solar panels or a photovoltaic device.
11. “White roof” shall mean a roofing system that utilizes white paint to reflect radiation back into space.
§2. Subdivision b of section 11-243 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new subparagraph 11 to read as follows:
or (11) the installation or alteration of a green roof, solar panel roof, or a white roof.
§3. This local law shall take effect immediately upon enactment.
LF 
LS # 5548
2/6/09
